predicate.note: Frames file for 'mean' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus. Many senses to verb, but they all have the same structure.

roleset.name: intend, explain, is equivalent to

example.name: resulted in
example.text: Huge gains by her students in 1987 and 1988 meant a total of $5000 in bonuses over two years.
example.arg: Huge gains by her students in 1987 and 1988
a total of $5000 in bonuses over two years.

example.name: this means that
example.text: The leeway that Sea Containers has means that Temple would have to substantially increase their bid.
example.arg: The leeway that Sea Containers has
Temple would have to substantially increase their bid.

roleset.note: Note that the complementizer "that" is not included--this is to be --> --consistent with the verbs of saying.
